verbose_text: To investigate whether ITZ can block the lipid transfer activity of OSBP, we used a set of in vitro liposomal assays (Supplemental Experimental Procedures) to measure the transport of dehydroergosterol (DHE) (XREF_FIG A) and PI4P (XREF_FIG D) between ER like and Golgi like liposomes.
evidence: ITZ can block the lipid transfer activity of OSBP
